ca.concordia.soen6441.d20.fighter

Class Fighter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • ca.concordia.soen6441.d20.gamemap.element.GameObject
        • ca.concordia.soen6441.d20.fighter.Fighter

  • public class Fighter
extends GameObject
    This class is used to create a character, a monster or a player.
    Author:
    alvaro, mostafa

        public GameObjectEntity getEntity()
        Description copied from class: GameObject
